sourcesContent:
export const prodImagesDir = "/prod_images/";

export const productSizesStyle = "buttons"; // CAN SET: select , buttons

export const productColorsStyle = "images"; // CAN SET: select , colors, buttons, images
export const allowOutOfStock = "yes"; // CAN SET: yes, no

export const colorOrImage = "images"; // CAN SET: images, color

export const defaultImage = "default-image.jpg"; // SET ANY IMAGE AS DEFAULT

export const comingSoonS = "coming-soon-s.gif"; // SET ANY IMAGE AS coming soon

export const comingSoonM = "coming-soon-m.jpg"; // SET ANY IMAGE AS coming soon
